name: Remember Sauce
description: Remembers your sauce choice so you don't have to go through the menu. Remember to disable when you want to change it!

name: Garii's Arcade Menu
description: Keybind for entering Garii's Arcade in-game.

name: Achievements Guide
description: Keybind for accessing the Achievements Guide Menu.

name: More Faithfuller
description: Makes most references in the mod even more faithful to the original material, forgoing any changes made to fit with the mod's theming.

name: Debug Mode
description: Enables debug mode and any features that come with it.

name: [DEBUG] Bubble Opacity
description: Change the opacity of the speech bubbles. Some effects will not be affected. Only Works in Debug Mode.
